toc.meta: Dit is de inhoudsopgave van Willem III deel 1, eerste gedeelte

„Instructions for our right trusty and right welbeloved cousin and counsellor, William Earle of Portland, groome of our Stole, whom we have appointed our Ambassador Extraordinary to our good brother, the Most Christian King. Given, at our Court at Kensington, the 30th day of December 1697. In the ninth year of our reigne" 30 december 1697

„Additionall instructions for our right trusty and right webeloved cousin and councellor William Earl of Portland, groom of our Stole, whom we have appointed our Ambassadour Extraordinary to our good brother, the Most Christian King. Given at our Court at Kensington the 8th day of January 1697/8. In the ninth year of our reign". 8 januari 1698
